name: Ancient Brontodon
flavor_text: It is taller than all but the tallest trees, and older than all but the oldest.

name: Anointed Deacon
oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target Vampire get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Inspiration is red as rubies, flowing like honeyed wine.

name: Bishop's Soldier
oracle_text: Lifelink
flavor_text: Vampires, the noble class of old Torrezon, are guided by their dual loyalties to church and crown.

name: Blight Keeper
oracle_text:
Flying
{7}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Blight Keeper: Target opponent loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.
flavor_text: It withers fruit and flesh alike.

name: Blinding Fog
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures this turn. Creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: "I see you, shiny soldiers, but you won't see me."

name: Blossom Dryad
oracle_text: {T}: Untap target land.
flavor_text: The only force on Ixalan not interested in finding the golden city is Ixalan itself.

name: Brazen Buccaneers
oracle_text:
Haste
When Brazen Buccaneers enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Cancel
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
flavor_text:
"Hold your fire, obviously."
—Captain Brandis Thorn

name: Castaway's Despair
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Castaway's Despair enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

name: Cobbled Wings
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has flying.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: Flotsam held together by optimism.

name: Colossal Dreadmaw
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text: If you feel the ground quake, run. If you hear its bellow, flee. If you see its teeth, it's too late.

name: Commune with Dinosaurs
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Dinosaur or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Contract Killing
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: For a price, the floating city of High and Dry offers all the amenities a pirate could want: rest, recreation, and revenge.

name: Costly Plunder
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: No lock of iron is a match for Vraska's will of stone.

name: Crash the Ramparts
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Legion's conquistadors could endure Ixalan's sun. Their forts could withstand a charging ceratops. But nothing can stop a ceratops strengthened by the sun.

name: Crushing Canopy
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with flying.
• Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text:
"Do not mistake your lofty vantage point for safety."
—Shaper Tuvasa

name: Deadeye Tormentor
oracle_text: Raid — When Deadeye Tormentor enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, target opponent discards a card.
flavor_text: Despite their noble heritage, the pirates of the Deadeye Fleet are known for underhanded tactics and despicable trickery.

name: Deeproot Warrior
oracle_text: Whenever Deeproot Warrior becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"We breathe from our soul and bones to give strength to the jungle. The jungle breathes from its roots and rivers to give strength to us."
—Shaper Falani

name: Demolish
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or land.
flavor_text: What took months for human hands to carve took just seconds for the dinosaur's tail to ruin.

name: Demystify
oracle_text: Destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: "The River Heralds carve spells into jade, hoping to steer us from our course. But what right do they have to keep us from that which once was ours?"

name: Depths of Desire
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: Pockets full of gold, lungs full of brine.

name: Desperate Castaways
oracle_text: Desperate Castaways can't attack unless you control an artifact.
flavor_text: A pirate crew without a ship is a crew that will do anything to get one.

name: Dire Fleet Hoarder
oracle_text: When Dire Fleet Hoarder dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: Among the pirates of the Brazen Coalition, the only thing more dangerous than failure is success.

name: Dire Fleet Interloper
oracle_text:
Menace
When Dire Fleet Interloper enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Dive Down
oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +0/+3 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: "Seeing the river is not the same as seeing the fish."

name: Dual Shot
oracle_text: Dual Shot deals 1 damage to each of up to two target creatures.
flavor_text: "Through me the rage of Tilonalli burns twice as bright."

name: Duress
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text: Solitude and starvation are brutal punishments, but even worse is all that time to think.

name: Encampment Keeper
oracle_text:
First strike
{7}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Encampment Keeper: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Paladins of the Sanctum Seeker order are an adventurous lot, venturing into the wilds with monstrous mastiffs at their side.

name: Fathom Fleet Cutthroat
oracle_text: When Fathom Fleet Cutthroat enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn.
flavor_text: "It was a bad evening for you, mate. Now it's chow time for the sharks."

name: Fathom Fleet Firebrand
oracle_text: {1}{R}: Fathom Fleet Firebrand gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: As she charges into battle, her arcane tattoos stir and crawl like fiery serpents.

name: Firecannon Blast
oracle_text:
Firecannon Blast deals 3 damage to target creature.
Raid — Firecannon Blast deals 6 damage instead if you attacked this turn.
flavor_text: Goblins' fearlessness and diminutive size make them the perfect cannoneers.

name: Fire Shrine Keeper
oracle_text:
Menace
{7}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Fire Shrine Keeper: It deals 3 damage to each of up to two target creatures.
flavor_text: Though grimed with the dust of centuries, the ancient shrine was not unguarded.

name: Frenzied Raptor
flavor_text: Sun Empire warriors are taught to emulate the fearless raptors that fling themselves against towers of horn and muscle a hundred times their size.

name: Gilded Sentinel
flavor_text: The River Heralds fight to keep all others from reaching the golden city. The city has its own defenses.

name: Grazing Whiptail
oracle_text: Reach
flavor_text: Often found browsing on the upper canopies of Ixalan's jungles, whiptails are known to absently bat away anything foolish enough to interrupt their meal.

name: Headstrong Brute
oracle_text:
Headstrong Brute can't block.
Headstrong Brute has menace as long as you control another Pirate.
flavor_text:
"Watch your backs, keep your blades at hand, and let the orc go first!"
—Captain Brandis Thorn

name: Headwater Sentries
flavor_text: "The elders say that if the intruders discovered the secret of the golden city, it would mean an end to our people."

name: Hierophant's Chalice
oracle_text:
When Hierophant's Chalice enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: In the Rite of Redemption, nobles take the same vows as Elenda, the first vampire, and make the same eternal sacrifice.

name: Hijack
oracle_text: Gain control of target artifact or creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: Trapped on Ixalan, the Planeswalker Angrath is the only minotaur sailing the seas. No matter how many ships he captures, he cannot break free.

name: Huatli's Snubhorn
oracle_text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor_text: Don't make the mistake of thinking blunt horns can't kill.

name: Ixalli's Diviner
oracle_text: When Ixalli's Diviner enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Ixalli's Keeper
oracle_text: {7}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Ixalli's Keeper: Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: The people of the Sun Empire worship the sun in three aspects. Ixalli is the Verdant Sun, who fosters growth in all things.

name: Jade Guardian
oracle_text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
When Jade Guardian enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target Merfolk you control.
flavor_text: The River Heralds believe that jade gives weight to their magic.

name: Jungle Delver
oracle_text: {3}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Jungle Delver.
flavor_text: "There is no power too great to be used in the defense of our ancestral lands."

name: Kinjalli's Caller
oracle_text: Dinosaur spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: The people of the Sun Empire worship the sun in three aspects. Kinjalli is the Wakening Sun, who created humans from clay and baked them in the sun's warmth.

name: Legion Conquistador
oracle_text: When Legion Conquistador enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of cards named Legion Conquistador, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The Legion of Dusk sailed from Torrezon in search of glory, riches, and the Immortal Sun.

name: Legion's Judgment
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
flavor_text: "My lance was once wielded by Venerable Tarrian. In his name and by his might, I cast you down!"

name: Looming Altisaur
flavor_text: Nature can't be tamed, but the Sun Empire believes that humans are made stronger when they test themselves against the wild strength of the dinosaurs.

name: March of the Drowned
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return two target Pirate cards from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Mark of the Vampire
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has lifelink.
flavor_text:
"Through your sacrifice of self, you become holy. Through your strength, all will be saved."
—From the Rite of Redemption

name: Nest Robber
oracle_text: Haste
flavor_text:
"These sailors on our shores are like the dinosaurs that plunder eggs from nests. They live on the labors of others."
—Itzama the Crested

name: New Horizons
oracle_text:
Enchant land
When New Horizons enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

name: One With the Wind
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
flavor_text:
"River and sea, jungle and sky. Water flows freely between the two halves of the world. We are creatures of the water."
—Shaper Tuvasa

name: Opt
oracle_text:
Scry 1.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "It's easy to anticipate Captain Storm's orders: take the more dangerous route."

name: Paladin of the Bloodstained
oracle_text: When Paladin of the Bloodstained enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.
flavor_text: Closely linked to the Church of Dusk, the paladins of the Bloodstained order are devout to the point of fanaticism.

name: Pious Interdiction
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Pious Interdiction enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text: "Ours is the true and righteous path. You will bow before our might."

name: Pirate's Cutlass
oracle_text:
When Pirate's Cutlass enters the battlefield, attach it to target Pirate you control.
Equipped creature gets +2/+1.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Pirate's Prize
oracle_text: Draw two cards. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: Nothing warms the heart like plunder.

name: Pounce
oracle_text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text: The drive to hunt and feed is raw instinct for dinosaurs. The trick is simply to channel it in the right direction.

name: Prosperous Pirates
oracle_text: When Prosperous Pirates enters the battlefield, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: The floating city of High and Dry hasn't yet sunk under the weight of gold, but it's not for want of trying.

name: Prying Blade
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+0.
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Pterodon Knight
oracle_text: Pterodon Knight has flying as long as you control a Dinosaur.
flavor_text: "To rise like the sun—there is no greater feeling."

name: Queen's Agent
oracle_text:
Lifelink
When Queen's Agent enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Queen's Bay Soldier
flavor_text: The soldiers of the Legion of Dusk have come to the colonies at Queen's Bay in search of glory and riches. They are veterans of centuries of warfare, and they thirst for conquest.

name: Queen's Commission
oracle_text: Create two 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink.
flavor_text:
"Let the blood of the impure flow through you. Only the blessings of the golden city will purge its acrid taste from your mouth."
—High Marshal Arguel

name: Raptor Companion
flavor_text: A raptor will follow any order as long as that order is "hunt," "kill," or "go for the guts."

name: Ravenous Daggertooth
oracle_text: Enrage — Whenever Ravenous Daggertooth is dealt damage, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: A daggertooth's triumphant roar makes all the sounds of jungle life fall silent.

name: Rile
oracle_text:
Rile deals 1 damage to target creature you control. That creature gains trample until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: The enormous can still be at the mercy of the small.

name: Ritual of Rejuvenation
oracle_text:
You gain 4 life.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "Nothing is more sacred than the gift of blood. Blessed are the vein that empties and the heart that is renewed."

name: River Heralds' Boon
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and a +1/+1 counter on up to one target Merfolk.
flavor_text: "We are kin to the trees, and their strength is our own."

name: Rummaging Goblin
oracle_text: {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
flavor_text: Goblins' eager curiosity leads them to scavenging, petty theft, and the rigging of sleek pirate ships. Some stop at scavenging.

name: Run Aground
oracle_text: Put target artifact or creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text:
"That's the first time I've seen the ground do the running."
—Captain Brinely Rage

name: Sailor of Means
oracle_text: When Sailor of Means enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text: In the Brazen Coalition, the wheels of business are greased with plunder.

name: Shaper Apprentice
oracle_text: Shaper Apprentice has flying as long as you control another Merfolk.
flavor_text: The River Heralds would wreck a thousand ships to keep intruders from finding the golden city.

name: Shining Aerosaur
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"The invaders cloak themselves in the shadows of dusk. Aerosaurs hide in the brilliance of the noonday sun."
—Caparocti Sunborn

name: Shipwreck Looter
oracle_text: Raid — When Shipwreck Looter enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavor_text: One pirate's wreck is another's reward.

name: Shore Keeper
oracle_text: {7}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Shore Keeper: Draw three cards.
flavor_text: Over their long life spans, the larger trilobites accumulate vast treasure troves in their guts.

name: Siren Lookout
oracle_text:
Flying
When Siren Lookout enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Siren's Ruse
oracle_text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If a Pirate was exiled this way, draw a card.
flavor_text: Deception and misdirection are the heart of the pirate's arsenal.

name: Skittering Heartstopper
oracle_text: {B}: Skittering Heartstopper gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor_text: It flows like water over the forest floor, as deadly as the swiftest current.

name: Skulduggery
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +1/+1 and target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1.
flavor_text: "They're so much more willing to parley once they're hanging from a boom by the ankle!"

name: Skyblade of the Legion
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Vampires call the gift of flight "exultation." For their enemies, it brings only sorrow.

name: Skymarch Bloodletter
oracle_text:
Flying
When Skymarch Bloodletter enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: From the perpetual shadowsmoke that hung above the ship, a silent form emerged, lips curled with malice and anticipation.

name: Slash of Talons
oracle_text: Slash of Talons deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text:
"The amber sun smokes with fury, gazing on foes that gather like ants invading our home. We are ready! Blade and claw strike as one."
—Huatli

name: Spell Pierce
oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
flavor_text:
"A fool's fire is quickly quenched."
—Shaper Kumena

name: Spike-Tailed Ceratops
oracle_text: Spike-Tailed Ceratops can block an additional creature each combat.
flavor_text: The conquistadors surrounded the dinosaur only to find that it had outflanked them.

name: Spreading Rot
oracle_text: Destroy target land. Its controller loses 2 life.
flavor_text:
"What is this foul presence that defies the sun's cleansing rays?"
—Itzama the Crested

name: Stone Quarry
oracle_text:
Stone Quarry enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
flavor_text: The Sun Empire's cities are built from the bones of the earth.

name: Storm Fleet Pyromancer
oracle_text: Raid — When Storm Fleet Pyromancer enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, Storm Fleet Pyromancer deals 2 damage to any target.

name: Storm Sculptor
oracle_text:
Storm Sculptor can't be blocked.
When Storm Sculptor enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: In his hands, the wind can become a weapon or a means of escape.

name: Sun-Crowned Hunters
oracle_text: Enrage — Whenever Sun-Crowned Hunters is dealt damage, it deals 3 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
flavor_text: One alone is dangerous, and they are never alone.

name: Sunrise Seeker
oracle_text:
Vigilance
When Sunrise Seeker enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Sure Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Everyone has a weak spot."

name: Swashbuckling
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has haste.
flavor_text: The pirates of the Brazen Coalition are the descendants of those displaced by the Legion of Dusk, and they are eager for vengeance.

name: Territorial Hammerskull
oracle_text: Whenever Territorial Hammerskull attacks, tap target creature an opponent controls.
flavor_text: From the eyes up, it's solid bone and stubbornness.

name: Thrash of Raptors
oracle_text: As long as you control another Dinosaur, Thrash of Raptors gets +2/+0 and has trample.
flavor_text: They glide through the undergrowth, drawn to sounds of disturbance. They attack in unison and all share in the kill. And then they move on.

name: Tilonalli's Knight
oracle_text: Whenever Tilonalli's Knight attacks, if you control a Dinosaur, Tilonalli's Knight gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The people of the Sun Empire worship the sun in three aspects. Tilonalli is the Burning Sun, associated with ferocity, fire, and passion.

name: Tishana's Wayfinder
oracle_text: When Tishana's Wayfinder enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: "There is always another way."

name: Unfriendly Fire
oracle_text: Unfriendly Fire deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Disputes within the Brazen Coalition can escalate from insult to broadside in the blink of an eye.

name: Unknown Shores
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text:
"Just imagine what's waiting around the bend. Adventure. Discovery. Riches for the taking. This is why I sail."
—Captain Lannery Storm

name: Vampire's Zeal
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's a Vampire, it gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Feast of Blood sends new life essence flowing through the vampire who partakes, manifesting as even greater strength and speed.

name: Vanquish the Weak
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 3 or less.
flavor_text: The clerics known as condemners punish those who do not recognize the righteous authority of the church.

name: Watertrap Weaver
oracle_text: When Watertrap Weaver enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text: The river is a powerful friend.

name: Wind Strider
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
flavor_text: "Currents are currents, whether in sea or sky."

name: Woodland Stream
oracle_text:
Woodland Stream enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
flavor_text: Countless streams flow into the nine rivers, and the nine rivers flow into the Great River. The River Heralds guard them all.
